title: Server side lag
body:
Guys, gals, others,

I'm experiencing server side lag (has been since patch 6.20) my isp and computer are fine. Just had a massive aram lag out (got booted out 3 times)

During this game, ping 28-30ms, while the game was borked I closed lol, rand a quick speed and ping test, 20mbit down, 800kbit up and a 27ms ping to Sydney (I'm in Canberra)

this has been happening for about 2 weeks, I've spoken to support who've got me jumping through all the test hoops and passing.

I've seen multiple people in game experiencing what I am experiencing, these people usually have better hardware than me too.

What's going on ?

Literally nothing changed for me except when 6.20 came out, I start randomly lagging.

Since I'm evidently not the only one, I'd like to know if anyone has any insight. FTR I as not running anything else (no p2p, streaming, casting, voip) and no one else in on the dsl service, so it's not some sneaky app sucking the bandwidth out of the connection.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

I should add before perusing the details, that these 'lag spikes' for lack of an accurate term, are not indicative of say 80-120ms ping (that is the max you see below) more like 1000--3000ms (at more than one point I've experienced 'attempting to reconnect' mid game

Also I have not provided a link as it contains my ip address (but I kept the test open so I can refer back to it should you need more info from it)

I expanded the only red mark of note (and isolated it in the listing)

|                       Host              -   %  | Sent | Recv | Best | Avrg | Wrst | Last |

|                   No response from host -  100 |   50 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |
|                   No response from host -  100 |   50 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |
|                   No response from host -  100 |   50 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |
|                   No response from host -  100 |   50 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |
|                   No response from host -  100 |   50 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |
|                   No response from host -  100 |   50 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |
|                           59.154.142.92 -    0 |  249 |  249 |   22 |   24 |  104 |   23 |
|                           61.88.116.210 -    1 |  245 |  244 |   23 |   27 |  101 |   25 |
|                   No response from host -  100 |   50 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |

If you're not comfortable posting the link publically then please feel free to email it to me @ **sephirothego@gmail.com**

Please include a link to your thread in the email.
